sentences.en: ...a supply of note paper bearing the presidential seal.
sentences.cn: …一批盖有总统印章的便条纸。

sentences.en: A trainer throws fish to his seals.
sentences.cn: 驯兽人把鱼儿扔给他的海豹.

sentences.en: Check seals on fridges and freezers regularly.
sentences.cn: 定期检查冰箱和冷冻柜的密封装置。

sentences.en: Clubbing baby seals to death for their pelts is wrong.
sentences.cn: 为了获得海豹皮而用棍棒打死幼海豹是不道德的。

sentences.en: Our special canning process seals the flavour in.
sentences.cn: 我们的特殊装罐方法能保存味道.

sentences.en: Seals and whales are marine animals.
sentences.cn: 海豹和鲸鱼是海中的动物.

sentences.en: Seals are sporting about in the water.
Seals provide people with meat and fat.
sentences.cn: 海豹给人们提供肉和脂肪.

sentences.en: Seals, turtles and penguins have flippers.
sentences.cn: 海豹 、 海龟、企鹅均有鳍状肢.

sentences.en: The crust seals the soil and prevents the evaporation of water.
sentences.cn: 这层表皮把土壤封闭,防止水份蒸发.

sentences.en: The seals feed mainly on fish and squid.
sentences.cn: 海豹主要以鱼和乌贼为食.

sentences.en: There appears to be another outbreak of sickness among seals in the North Sea.
sentences.cn: 看来北海的海豹又要爆发另一场疾病了。

sentences.en: There are lots of marine mammals such as whales and seals in the sea.
sentences.cn: 海洋里有许多诸如鲸鱼和海豹类的海生哺乳动物.

sentences.en: There is a campaign against those hunters who mercilessly slaughter baby seals.
sentences.cn: 一场反对那些残酷屠杀小海豹的猎手的运动正在展开.

sentences.en: They saw many seals off the Coast of Alaska.
sentences.cn: 他们在阿拉斯加海岸外看见很多海豹.

sentences.en: Whales, seals, penguins, and turtles have flippers.
sentences.cn: 鲸 、 海豹, 企鹅和海龟均有鳍形肢.

phrases.tran_cn: 迷宫式密封；曲径密封垫片
n. 橡胶密封圈；橡皮垫；橡胶塞；橡皮密封
轴封，轴封装置；主轴密封

trans.tran_cn: 海豹( seal的名词复数 )，批准，（火漆）封印，印章
密封( seal的第三人称单数 )，决定，确定，封上（信封）
